plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion en CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName @(Project.iOS.BundleName) CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString @(Project.Version) CFBundleSignature ???? CFBundleURLTypes
CFBundleTypeRole None CFBundleURLSchemes
#if @(Project.Mobile.UriScheme:isset) @(Project.Mobile.UriScheme) #endif #if @(Project.iOS.PList.UriSchemes:isset) @(Project.iOS.PList.UriSchemes:splitAndJoin('\n\t\t\t\t', '', '')) #endif
CFBundleVersion @(Project.iOS.BundleVersion) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
UIRequiresFullScreen
UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities
armv7 #if @(Project.iOS.PList.UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities:isset) @(Project.iOS.PList.UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities:splitAndJoin('\n\t\t', '', '')) #endif
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
#if @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Auto')) || @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Portrait')) UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown #endif #if @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Auto')) || @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Landscape')) UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight #endif
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations~ipad
#if @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Auto')) || @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Portrait')) UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown #endif #if @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Auto')) || @(Project.Mobile.Orientations:Equals('Landscape')) UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight #endif
@(Xcode.Plist.Element:join('\n\t'))
NSCameraUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSCameraUsageDescription || PListDefaults.NSCameraUsageDescription)
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription || PListDefaults.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription)
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription || PListDefaults.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription)
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.MKDirectionsApplicationSupportedModes:isset) MKDirectionsApplicationSupportedModes
@(Project.iOS.PList.MKDirectionsApplicationSupportedModes:splitAndJoin('\n\t\t', '', ''))
#endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHealthShareUsageDescription:isset) NSHealthShareUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHealthShareUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription:isset) NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSCalendarsUsageDescription:isset) NSCalendarsUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSCalendarsUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription:isset) NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription:isset) NSAppleMusicUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSContactsUsageDescription:isset) NSContactsUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSContactsUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHomeKitUsageDescription:isset) NSHomeKitUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSHomeKitUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription:isset) NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription) NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationUsageDescription:isset) NSLocationUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription:isset) NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription) #endif

#if @(Project.iOS.PList.NSFaceIDUsageDescription:isset) NSFaceIDUsageDescription @(Project.iOS.PList.NSFaceIDUsageDescription) #endif
#if @(FontFile:IsRequired) UIAppFonts
@(FontFile:join('\n\t\t', '@(BundleDirectory)/', ''))
#endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.UIApplicationExitsOnSuspend:isset) UIApplicationExitsOnSuspend <@(Project.iOS.PList.UIApplicationExitsOnSuspend:bool)/> #endif
UIBackgroundModes
#if @(iOS.BackgroundModes:IsRequired) @(iOS.BackgroundModes:join('\n\t\t', '', '')) #endif #if @(Project.iOS.PList.UIBackgroundModes:isset) @(Project.iOS.PList.UIBackgroundModes:splitAndJoin('\n\t\t', '', '')) #endif #if @(Project.iOS.SystemCapabilities.Location:test(1, 0)) location #endif #if @(Project.iOS.SystemCapabilities.Push:test(1, 0)) remote-notification #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.UIFileSharingEnabled:isset) UIFileSharingEnabled <@(Project.iOS.PList.UIFileSharingEnabled:bool)/> #endif
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.UINewsstandApp:isset) UINewsstandApp <@(Project.iOS.PList.UINewsstandApp:bool)/> #endif

#if @(Project.iOS.PList.UIRequiresPersistentWiFi:isset) UIRequiresPersistentWiFi <@(Project.iOS.PList.UIRequiresPersistentWiFi:bool)/> #endif
UIStatusBarHidden <@(Mobile.DisableStatusbar:bool)/>
UIStatusBarStyle UIStatusBarStyleBlackOpaque
#if @(Project.iOS.PList.UISupportedExternalAccessoryProtocols:isset) UISupportedExternalAccessoryProtocols

#endif
